name: Electric Shaver Frighten Joke
description:
Electric Shaver Frighten Joke
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Electric Shaver.
Electric Shaver Scare joke - this is a game application simulator joke, where you can play and scare your friend!
Your boyfriend or girlfriend a beautiful hairstyle? Do you like jokes? Do you want to avenge your family?
Then our app for you!
Choosing one of the most beautiful electric shavers and include it!
Come back to the other and press the button and you will see the funny results!
If you touch another phone, your friend will be shocked and scared!
Be a master of practical jokes!
Attention! With help of this game you can not cut off the really hair!
Thank you for playing our apps! Leave us feedback and we will try to make it even better!
